name: edpsych-supabase-tools
description: Tools for resetting and configuring Supabase for EdPsych Connect Platform

scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm run update-env -- <supabase_url> <supabase_anon_key>
  npm run verify -- <supabase_url> <supabase_anon_key>
  npm run setup -- <supabase_url> <supabase_anon_key>
  npm run manual-verify -- <supabase_url> <supabase_anon_key>
  npm run check-connection -- <supabase_url>'

author: EdPsych Connect Team
